content.description: Starts anywhere really. Follow up the crack. Towards the top there will be an undercling in the crack, after that shift right as there is two jugs to make it as comfortable as a top out as possible.
content.protection: Many pads! Although it’s kind of a no fall allowed highball, so the pads are virtually there for mental comfort.
content.location: The right most crack on the main cliff

content.description: I GENUINELY dont Suggest this to anyone. It’s a very high highball, and the top out isn’t the best, theres A small Boulder in the wall that moved at the top, which freaked me out and made me rush toping out a different way as I had lost my cool mindset, lucky I didn’t fall.
content.protection: Lots of pads. The ground is flat under this so with many pads it could have some LIMITED amount of safety.
content.location: The second clear crack from the left Of the cliff

content.description: Start on the start to “I’m still standing”, traverse in the mini crack to the crack of “No going back”
content.protection: Pads however it’s a climb that you really aren’t allowed to fall on or it could end badly.

content.description: Nice Cliff! Ranges from about 28 feet on the right to 55 feet on the left. Has a few high balls and possibly some sketchy trad? With some top ropes of you set them up off trees.
